headlines.description: — Francisco Lindor homered from both sides of the plate and made a leaping catch at shortstop that saved at least two runs, sending the New York Mets to a 4-2 victory Friday night over the woeful Colorado Rockies.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lindor homers from both sides and Soto snaps hitless streak as Mets top Rockies 4-2
